user.title: Connect to Immich
user.description: Enter your Immich server address and API key. You can generate an API key in Immich under Account Settings → API Keys.

data_description.host: Full URL including port, e.g. http://192.168.1.100:2283

endpoint.title: Choose API Endpoint
endpoint.description: Select which Immich API endpoint the slideshow will use to retrieve photos.

random_params.title: Random Assets – Options
random_params.description: Configure how many random photos to load each refresh cycle.

all_params.title: All Assets – Options
all_params.description: Configure how many assets to load and the sort order.

album_params.title: Album Assets – Options
album_params.description: Select the album to use as the photo source.

favorites_params.title: Favorite Assets – Options
favorites_params.description: Configure how many favorite photos to load each refresh cycle.

search_params.title: Search Metadata – Options
search_params.description: Provide a JSON object of Immich search metadata fields. Example: {example}

intervals.title: Timing
intervals.description: Set how often the displayed photo rotates and how often new photos are fetched from Immich.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Immich. Check the URL and ensure Immich is reachable.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please check your Immich API key.
error.cannot_fetch_albums: Could not load albums from Immich. The entry was left empty; you may type an album ID manually.
error.invalid_json: Must be a valid JSON object, e.g. {"city": "Paris"}

abort.already_configured: This Immich instance is already configured.
